name: Objectives
description: Forgotten hangs over places the world has decided not to remember, where roads fall off maps and stories stop mid-sentence. In a Forgotten environment, dust and silence are never quite undisturbed; clues of past lives surface just long enough to suggest that someone, or something, still cares.

tableData.result: Recover a name erased from memory
Awaken the shrine nobody visits anymore
Map the road that no chart admits
Rekindle a vow abandoned by time
Claim the heirloom left in locked dust
Translate a diary written to be unread
Return a bone token to its rightful grave
Prove the village once stood on this soil
Summon the caretaker who never left
Seal away what oblivion refused to take
Restore a festival the world outgrew
Gather rumors about a place without echoes
Unbury a door beneath layered footsteps
Protect the last witness of a lost war
Hide your tracks from the remembering wind
Break the spell that keeps history mute
Return stolen hours to their rightful night
Guide a wandering house back onto maps
Carry a message to those never born
Extinguish a lantern that outlived its keeper
Convince the dead they were forgotten
Smuggle memories across a border of silence
Rebuild a shrine from its lingering shadow
Teach an abandoned idol a new prayer
Steal secrets from cobwebbed confessionals
Track a rumor that refuses to exist
Anchor a fading alley to the present
Silence the bell that rings for nobody
Offer comfort to a neglected storm spirit
Document footprints that appear without walkers
Free a prisoner history never recorded
Erase the last mention of your own name
Feed a hungry archive dust and blood
Bargain with a memory that will not fade
Haunt the house that refuses to remember
Guard a relic that forgets its purpose
Rewind a clock sealed in spiderglass
Plant a story where maps have holes
Lead a procession for the unsung dead
Teach a ruined street its former songs
Reclaim a throne no legend acknowledges
Ignite a beacon meant to stay dark
Convince a relic to remember its maker
Wake the hibernating rumor beneath tavern talk
Hide an atrocity in already lost ruins
Collect dreams abandoned by their dreamers
Return a wandering story to its birthplace
Cut a path through deliberately missing years
ACTION + THEME
ROLL TWICE

name: Atmosphere
description: Forgotten hangs over places the world has decided not to remember, where roads fall off maps and stories stop mid-sentence. In a Forgotten environment, dust and silence are never quite undisturbed; clues of past lives surface just long enough to suggest that someone, or something, still cares.

tableData.result: Dust motes drift like abandoned prayers
Footprints fade as you watch them
Whispers remember names no tongue recalls
Cobwebs veil doorways never opened again
Lanternlight reveals shelves of unread years
Wind rearranges ash into half-words
Ceiling cracks trace obsolete constellations
Every echo arrives a beat late
Mildew blooms over flaking family crests
Floorboards sigh with unspent confessions
Portrait eyes track you without recognition
Chill hangs where warmth once gathered
Old incense clings to breathless air
Rust gnaws through locks long unnecessary
Wallpaper peels like forgotten skin
Rain finds its way through lost roofs
Shadows occupy seats of absent guests
Clocks tick toward no appointed hour
Curtains sag, heavy with stale seasons
Books crumble when their titles are spoken
Faded embroidery shows faces nobody knows
Door handles cold from eternal disuse
Ash-filled hearth remembers unspoken arguments
Distant bells ring for empty streets
Smudged letters drift beneath frozen ink
Smell of old smoke without fire
Silence deepens after every small sound
Chairs stand slightly askew, awaiting return
Moss swallows paths erased from memory
Dried flowers keep vigil over dust
Ceaseless dripping marks a patient erasure
Light falls dull, refusing to sparkle
Statues wear lichen like burial shrouds
Staircase ends abruptly in boarded void
Cobblestones remember footsteps that never left
Murmurs seep from walls without mouths
Windows stare outward, filmed with forgetting
Keys hang labeled for missing doors
Air tastes of locked trunks opened once
Bent nails mark where portraits vanished
Long-cooled teacups wait beside empty chairs
Motes swirl when unseen shapes pass
Laughter lingers, stripped of its owners
Tapestries sag, scenes half-eaten by shadow
Cradles rock faintly with no breeze
Old bloodstains softened to harmless rose
Lantern hooks sway, yet nothing hangs
Rotting beams carry weightless memories
ACTION + THEME
ROLL TWICE

description: Forgotten hangs over places the world has decided not to remember, where roads fall off maps and stories stop mid-sentence. Faint lullaby echoes without a singer

Bell tower tolls but gears lie broken

Children’s toys arranged facing the darkest corner
Lanterns lit in streets no map records
Names whispered from wells long declared dry
Shadow of a crowd in an empty square

Wallpaper peels revealing frantic scratched messages beneath

Ashes in hearth still warm beneath cinders

Mirrors cloud over whenever names are spoken

Clothes hang to dry yet never dampen

Keys rust on hooks for doors now missing
Chalk circles renewed each time rain falls
Cold breath fogs glass from the wrong side
Forgotten shrine stacked with fresh but rotting offerings
Footprints lead into walls where doors once stood
